name: OR_LNLG_ROBOTICS
description: This table contains the Robotics information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SUB_PROC_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description: The name of the subprocedure of the robotics procedure. The specific items are extracted in table ZC_SUB_PROC_NAME.

columns.name: SUB_PROC_PT_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The position of the patient during the subprocedure of the robotics procedure. The specific items are extracted in table ZC_SUB_PROC_PT_POS.

columns.name: PORT_PL_DATE
columns.description: The date and time at which the port was placed during the subprocedure of the robotics procedure.

columns.name: DOCK_START_DATE
columns.description: The date and time at which the robot was docked during the subprocedure of the robotics procedure.

columns.name: CONSOLE_START_DATE
columns.description: The date and time at which the console was started for the subprocedure of the robotics procedure.

columns.name: CONSOLE_END_DATE
columns.description: The date and time at which the console was stopped during the subprocedure of the robotics procedure.

columns.name: DOCK_END_DATE
columns.description: The date and time at which the robot was undocked during the subprocedure of the robotics procedure.
